instructions.ar: ادخل Rotary Name واسلك المخرج الثانية على Way Name
instructions.da: Kør ind i Rotary Name og tag anden afkørsel ad Way Name
instructions.de: In den Kreisverkehr fahren und zweite Ausfahrt nehmen auf Way Name
instructions.en: Enter Rotary Name and take the 2nd exit onto Way Name
instructions.eo: Enveturu Rotary Name kaj sekve al 2. elveturejo al Way Name
instructions.es: Entra en Rotary Name y coge la 2ª salida en Way Name
instructions.es-ES: En Rotary Name toma la 2ª salida por Way Name
instructions.fi: Aja liikenneympyrään Rotary Name ja valitse 2. erkanemiskaista tielle Way Name
instructions.fr: Prendre le rond-point de Rotary Name, puis la seconde sortie sur Way Name
instructions.he: היכנס לRotary Name וצא ביציאה השניה לWay Name
instructions.hu: Hajtson be a Rotary Name körforgalomba, majd hajtson ki a 2. kijáraton a Way Name felé
instructions.id: Masuk Rotary Name dan ambil jalan keluar 2 arah Way Name
instructions.it: Immèttitì in Rotary Name e prendi la 2ª uscita in Way Name
instructions.ja: Rotary Nameの2 つ目の番出口からWay Nameを進む
instructions.ko: Rotary Name로 진입해서 두번째번 출구로 나가 Way Name로 가세요.
instructions.my: Rotary Nameကိုဝင်ပြီးဒုတိယကိုယူကာWay Nameပေါ်သို့ထွက်ပါ
instructions.nl: Ga het knooppunt Rotary Name op en neem afslag 2e naar Way Name
instructions.no: Kjør inn i Rotary Name og ta 2. avkjørsel inn på Way Name
instructions.pl: Wjedź na Rotary Name i wyjedź 2. zjazdem na Way Name
instructions.pt-BR: Entre em Rotary Name e saia na 2º saída em Way Name
instructions.pt-PT: Entre em Rotary Name e saia na saída 2º para Way Name
instructions.ro: Intrați în Rotary Name și urmați a doua ieșire pe Way Name
instructions.ru: На Rotary Name сверните на второй съезд на Way Name
instructions.sl: Zapeljite v Rotary Name in izberite 2.. izvoz za Way Name
instructions.sv: I Rotary Name, ta 2:a avfarten in på Way Name
instructions.tr: Rotary Name dönel kavşağa gir ve Way Name üzerindeki ikinci numaralı çıkışa gir
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь по Rotary Name та поверніть у 2й з'їзд на Way Name
instructions.vi: Đi vào Rotary Name và ra tại đường thứ 2 tức Way Name
instructions.yo: Tẹ Rotary Name ki o si ya 2nd jade pẹlẹpẹlẹ Way Name
instructions.zh-Hans: 进入Rotary Name环岛后从第二出口驶出，上Way Name
